Abyss Walker.card_desc: [Nether Step] Nether Step heals you for {scale=40|40} Health.

Abyssal Touch.card_desc: [Defiance] Defiance reduces the cooldown of Nether Step by {scale=1|1}s if it hits a champion.

Cursed Revolver.card_desc: [Weapon] Your Revolver becomes automatic with a slightly lower fire rate and increased damage.

Defiant Fist.card_desc: [Defiance] Successful hits with Revolver increase the damage of your next Defiance by 15% up to 100%.

Disrupt.card_desc: [Reversal] Reduce the cooldown of Reversal by {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Elusive.card_desc: [Nether Step] Gain {scale=10|10}% Movement speed for 3s after using Nether Step.

Equivalent Exchange.card_desc: [Reversal] Heal for {scale=10|10}% of the Damage absorbed by Reversal.

Featherweight.card_desc: [Armor] Gain {scale=6|6}% Damage Reduction while using Drift.

Godslayer.card_desc: [Reversal] Reversal now always fires back and deals a minimum of 800 damage.

Marksman.card_desc: [Defiance] If Defiance hits a Champion it generates {scale=1|1} Ammo.

Power of the Abyss.card_desc: [Reversal] Hitting a target with Reversal reduces the Cooldown of Nether Step by {scale=20|20}%

Seething Hatred.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting an enemy reduces the cooldown of Reversal by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Sleight of Hand.card_desc: [Nether Step] Using Nether Step generates {scale=1|1} Ammo.

Spiteful.card_desc: [Defiance] Killing enemies with Defiance generates {scale=3|3}% ultimate charge.

Through the Warp.card_desc: [Nether Step] Increase the distance of each Nether Step dash by {scale=10|10}%

Vengeance.card_desc: [Defiance] Killing an enemy with Defiance grants you {scale=200|200} Health.

Watchful.card_desc: [Armor] Getting an elimination reduces all active cooldowns by {scale=10|10}%
